attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public
attributes.additional_details: I cannot believe this got denied this year. Pets are scared not to talk about wildlife. People take it way too far. Some supermarkets have banned the sale of fireworks to support the members of the public that want this to happen but others are yet to do so.
attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public. Organised public events that include fireworks are fine but ‘bonefire night’ is more than just a night to some people. People are irresponsible

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
